snippet: Cheryl Boone Isaacs, president of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences, defended that organization’s decision to rescind an Oscar nomination for the song “Alone Yet Not Alone.”
abstract: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences Pres Cheryl Boone Isaacs says academy's decision to rescind Oscar nomination for song from movie Alone Yet Not Alone was based on appearance of undue influence by song’s composer, not because of movie's religious message.
lead_paragraph: Cheryl Boone Isaacs, president of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences, defended that organization’s decision to rescind an Oscar nomination for the song “Alone Yet Not Alone.”

headline.print_headline: Academy President Defends Ruling on Song
headline.main: Academy President Defends Ruling on Song

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
